sensors

Class MyUltraSonicSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • lejos.nxt.UltrasonicSensor
      • sensors.MyUltraSonicSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdatingSensor

    public class MyUltraSonicSensor
extends lejos.nxt.UltrasonicSensor
implements UpdatingSensor
    This class holds all the utilities to control the ultrasonic sensor. Also this is a boundary class for the actual ultrasonic sensor
    Since:
    01-04-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Bezem
